item.title: Resolving Jenkins Artifactory Plugin Artifact Upload Failure "unable to find valid certification path to requested target"
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article describes how to resolve SSL certificate validation issues when uploading artifacts from a Jenkins agent to Artifactory, including generating a security certificate file and importing it into Java’s cacerts.
